unnormalised: Oyee hoyee! Heard about the latest traffic rule changes? Things are getting real on the roads of Delhi, Mumbai and Chennai.
normalised: Oyee hoyee! Heard about the latest traffic rule changes? Things are getting real on the roads of Delhi, Mumbai and Chennai.

unnormalised: First up, fines are going up! Expect to shell out more than Rs. 500 for even minor infractions. Dr. Sharma from the Traffic Police HQ announced a new initiative focusing on lane discipline near busy junctions like ITO in Delhi.
normalised: First up, fines are going up! Expect to shell out more than rupee five hundred for even minor infractions. Doctor Sharma from the Traffic Police H Q announced a new initiative focusing on lane discipline near busy junctions like I T O in Delhi.

unnormalised: Turns out, that old helmet of yours might not cut it anymore. Stricter helmet standards are being enforced. No more flimsy ones!
normalised: Turns out, that old helmet of yours might not cut it anymore. Stricter helmet standards are being enforced. No more flimsy ones!

unnormalised: And get this – they are expanding no-parking zones by almost 200 sq ft around schools and hospitals. So, think twice before you park outside Modern School, Barakhamba.
normalised: And get this – they are expanding no-parking zones by almost two hundred square feet around schools and hospitals. So, think twice before you park outside Modern School, Barakhamba.

unnormalised: Plus, mandatory PUC (Pollution Under Control) checks are back with a vengeance! Remember that Diwali offer on your old car? Well, its carbon footprint better be in check!
normalised: Plus, mandatory P U C (Pollution Under Control) checks are back with a vengeance! Remember that Diwali offer on your old car? Well, its carbon footprint better be in check!

unnormalised: They're even cracking down on modified silencers. That 'dhoom' sound could now cost you serious Rs.
normalised: They're even cracking down on modified silencers. That 'dhoom' sound could now cost you serious rupee.

unnormalised: Basically, drive safe, obey the rules, and avoid the chalaan. Jai Hind!
normalised: Basically, drive safe, obey the rules, and avoid the chalaan. Jai Hind!
